channel.title: Banned?
channel.description:
I got banned on my ip 24.48.138.37 just because I created another account to help people. None of my posts got approved until half an hour or more after posting. People appreciated my help and for it i got banned.
What is up with that?

item.title: Banned?
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

Creating accounts is against the rules. Read the rules of every section and the global rules before posting.

Here are the global rules.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342270.0.html

Read full topic
